tool_description: This API allows you to interact with the SoundCloud platform, providing scraping and downloading capabilities for tracks. You can retrieve track information and generate download links for SoundCloud tracks.
name: SoundCloud Scraper and Downloader API
title: SoundCloud Scraper and Downloader API

api_list.name: RetrieveTrackInfo
api_list.description: Fetches information about a SoundCloud track based on the provided track URL.

api_list.name: Retrieve PLayList Meta Data
api_list.description: By using this endpoint you can retrieve all the meta data of playlist
